name: Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack, 1 Subject, College Ruled Paper, 8 x 10-1/2 Inch, Pastel Pink, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue and Purple, 70 Sheets (63756)
review: -perfect for any use-colours are so cute-good amount of pages for school subjects-good quality

name: Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack, 1 Subject, College Ruled Paper, 8 x 10-1/2 Inch, Pastel Pink, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue and Purple, 70 Sheets (63756)
review: The Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack is a game-changer! With its vibrant and pastel colors of pink, orange, yellow, green, blue, and purple, it instantly caught my eye. As someone who loves stationery, I couldn't resist picking these up.The quality of the paper is exceptional. It's college-ruled, providing ample space for note-taking or doodling. Each notebook contains 70 sheets, which is perfect for a single subject. I was pleasantly surprised by how sturdy the spiral binding is; it keeps all the pages neatly intact.My kids absolutely adore these notebooks. The colorful covers make studying more enjoyable for them, and they each have their favorite color. Whether it's for schoolwork or personal use, these notebooks have become a staple in our home. Plus, having a variety of colors means there's always one to suit their mood or style.In summary, the Oxford Spiral Notebook 6 Pack has been a hit in our household. Its durability, vibrant colors, and ample pages have made it a must-have for both kids and adults. It's a simple yet effective way to add a touch of joy to your everyday note-taking.
date: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2024
